name: The Night Shift (itch)
description:
The Night Shift brings you back to the days of a dark fantastic era: the days of the GameBoy classic, and puts you in the skin of a great hero: the gravedigger.

Prevent the walking dead from escaping the graveyard and put them back to rest. Keep the job and save the innocents.

Game built with GameMaker

Sound effects created with Bfxr

Music composed with beepbox

NOTE:
It's not been fully tested but it shouldn't give any trouble.

Good luck, and good night muhahahaha
